targets.expr:
((
  sum(rate(linera_value_cache_hit[2m])) by (key_type, value_type)
)
/
(
  sum(rate(linera_value_cache_hit[2m])) by (key_type, value_type)
  +
  sum(rate(linera_value_cache_miss[2m])) by (key_type, value_type)
)) * 100
